metadata.title: Zenna Home Slat Style Bathroom Linen Tower, 5 Shelves, Satin Nickel
features: LINEN TOWER CREATES VALUABLE BATHROOM STORAGE: Metal slat style shelves provide 5 tiers of storage in a compact space
IDEAL FOR LINENS AND MORE: Each shelf measures 13 in. square, perfect for holding towels or other bath items
MADE FOR BATHROOM, BUT USE ANYWHERE: Great for bathroom storage or use in bedroom, playroom, utility room, garage and more
RICH RUST-RESISTANT FINISH: Satin nickel finish looks great and is made to resist rust
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Assembles in just 20 minutes; mounting hardware and illustrated instructions included
description: The Zenna Home Slat Style Linen Tower takes up only minimal floor space while adding five shelves of useful storage to any bathroom. With its attractive finish, small footprint and wide, slat-style shelves, the linen tower looks great, fits into almost any bathroom and provides flat, sturdy storage for assorted bathroom items. Keep towels, washcloths, toiletries and more conveniently inside your bathroom, all on flat shelving that won't allow items to topple over like they can with typical wire shelving units. The tower's five shelves can also display decorative bath accessories. Or use the tower in any room (bedroom, playroom, basement, utility room, garage) where sturdy flat storage is needed. The tower's metal frame is finished in satin nickel to fit in well with most bath decor and hardware styles.
